instructions.reason_for_call:
You have a couple requests.
For order #W5056519, you want to change the address to be the same as order #W8277957. For order #W5056519, you want to  exchange Makeup Kit {'skin tone': 'light', 'kit size': 'professional', 'brand': 'Brand B'} to {'skin tone': 'dark', 'brand': 'Brand A'}. Finally, you want to cancel order #W5995614 because you ordered by mistake.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Yara Muller and your email is yara.muller9246@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello, I actually have a few requests regarding my orders. Could you help me with changing the address for one of my orders, exchanging an item in that same order, and canceling another order?

message.content: Hello, I actually have a few requests regarding my orders. Could you help me with changing the address for one of my orders, exchanging an item in that same order, and canceling another order?

messages.content:
I can help with all three, but first I need to authenticate you. Please provide either:

- your email address; or  
- your first name, last name, and zip code.

After that I’ll look up your user profile and your orders. Also please provide these details so I can prepare next steps:

1) For the order you want the address changed (you said this is the same order you want an item exchanged): please provide the order id (format like #W0000000) and the new shipping address (address1, address2 if any, city, state, zip, country).

2) For the exchange on that same order: the item id(s) you want to exchange (item ids like 1008292230), the new item id(s) you want instead (must be same product type), and which payment method to use for any price difference (e.g., gift_card_0000000 or credit_card_0000000). If you need me to list your payment methods, I can after authentication.

3) For the cancel request: the order id to cancel and the cancellation reason (must be exactly either "no longer needed" or "ordered by mistake").

Once you provide your email (or name+zip) and the details above, I’ll look up your account and orders.

2) For the exchange in order #W5056519, I want to exchange the Makeup Kit with skin tone light, kit size professional, brand Brand B to a Makeup Kit with skin tone dark, brand Brand A. I don't have the item IDs or payment method details.

{"message":"Thanks — I’ve located your account (user id yara_muller_8652) and the orders you referenced. Here’s what I propose and what I need you to confirm before I take any action (I will only proceed after you reply “yes”):

Summary of current data:
- Your default address: 575 Oak Street, Suite 866, Phoenix, AZ 85041, USA
- Order #W5056519 (status: pending) — current shipping address: 575 Oak Street, Suite 866, Phoenix, AZ 85041, USA. Items: 1x Makeup Kit (item_id 7902309762): skin tone light, kit size professional, brand Brand B — price $243.62.
- Order #W8277957 (status: cancelled) — shipping address to copy: 380 Maple Drive, Suite 960, San Diego, CA 92101, USA.
- Product variants for Makeup Kit (product_id 5149340237) include an available item matching your desired target: item_id 1573035764 (skin tone dark, kit size professional, brand Brand A) — available — price $253.98.
- Order #W5995614 (status: pending) — items: Dumbbell Set and Luggage Set — total $1074.31.
- Your available payment method on file: credit_card_3095586 (Visa ending 6918).

Planned actions (please review carefully):
1) Modify shipping address for order #W5056519 to match order #W8277957 (new address: 380 Maple Drive, Suite 960, San Diego, CA 92101, USA). This is allowed because #W5056519 is pending.

2) Exchange item(s) in order #W5056519 (order is pending):
   - Exchange current item 7902309762 (Makeup Kit: light / professional / Brand B, $243.62) -> new item 1573035764 (Makeup Kit: dark / professional / Brand A, $253.98).
   - Price difference: $253.98 - $243.62 = $10.36 (you will be charged $10.36).
   - Payment method to use for the price difference: credit_card_3095586 (Visa ending 6918). If you prefer a different payment method, tell me which one (must be on your account).
   Important: modifying items for a pending order can only be done once. Confirm that this is the full and final set of item changes you want for this order.

3) Cancel order #W5995614 (status: pending) for reason: "ordered by mistake". If you confirm, the order status will change to cancelled and refund will be processed back to the original payment method (credit_card_3095586) in 5–7 business days.

Please confirm each action by replying with a single clear answer:
- If you want me to proceed with ALL three actions as summarized above, reply exactly: yes
- If you want only some of the actions, reply specifying which ones to proceed with (for example: "Proceed with exchange and address change on #W5056519, do not cancel #W5995614")
- If you want to change the payment method for the exchange, specify the payment method id to use instead of credit_card_3095586.

Once you reply with confirmation (or changes), I will perform the requested actions."}

messages.content:
Verify the following before outputting ###STOP###:

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).
###STOP###
